text: Nassarius kooli is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== ==Distribution== Nassarius kooli is native to the western pacific, with many specimens having been found in the east china sea.http://www.vianetconchology.com/index.php?main_page=4&parent;=5202&parent0;=45&parent1;=1&parent2;=1&parent3;=0&level;=3 ==References== Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2009
title: Nassarius kooli
